headline: Mizuho Raises Micron (MU) Price Target to $182 Ahead of Earnings
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the AI Stocks Analysts Are Tracking Closely. On September 16, Mizuho raised its price target on the stock to $182.00 from $155.00 on Monday, while maintaining an Outperform rating. The rating comes ahead of the company’s September 23 earnings report. The firm anticipates accelerated High Bandwidth Memory (HBM) demand […]

headline: Dow Jones Futures: Apple, Nvidia At Key Levels; Take Profits In These Stocks Going Vertical?
summary: The stock market is at highs as Apple breaks out, Nvidia at critical level. Micron earnings loom. Investors face a "happy dilemma."

headline: What Recent Developments Mean for Micron’s Valuation and Growth Story
summary: Micron Technology’s stock narrative continues to evolve as the consensus analyst price target has recently increased from $150.57 to $159.91. This upward revision comes in response to strong demand drivers such as accelerating artificial intelligence usage, robust data center growth, and heightened adoption by hyperscalers. These factors have contributed to a surge in DRAM and High Bandwidth Memory sales. Stay tuned to discover how you can keep up with the latest developments and trends...

headline: Costco earnings, Fedspeak, PCE: What to Watch Next Week
summary: Market Domination Overtime host Myles Udland previews several of the biggest stories and events to come next week, including EMCOR (EME), Robinhood Markets (HOOD), and Applovin (APP) joining the S&P 500 (^GSPC), earnings results from companies like Costco Wholesale (COST) and Micron Technology (MU), commentary from top Federal Reserve officials, and the release of August's Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) index — the Fed's preferred inflation gauge — on Friday, September 26 To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.
